GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api
GET /api.exampleResponse: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with body removed and comment_count added- sorted by age in descending order by default but can be sorted by specified columns with a sort_by query and can be set to ascending order using the order query. Can be queried by topic to only select articles relating to a specific topic. Includes pagination with the default limit set to 10 and the default page set to 1 but these can be passed as queries to change them.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object given its id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for an article given an article_id sorted by newest first and paginated with a default of page 1 and limit of 10- these can be changed in the queries

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment for an article given an article_id, the post body contains username and body key value pairs as strings

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes for an article by the amount passed in the body in the format {inc_votes: newVote}

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: deletes a comment when passed the comment id as a paramter

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object given their username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes for an comment by the amount passed in the body in the format {inc_votes: newVote}

POST /api/articles.description: adds a new article based on the body passed, body takes the properties author, title, body topic, article_img_url(optional)

article.title: Post request success
article.author: butter_bridge
article.body: This article was posted to the articles table using a post request!

POST /api/topics.description: adds a new topic to the topics table when given a slug and description in the body and responds with the newly added topic
